newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies bond 10 issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies bond 10 issues for insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp said it qualified for insurance 10 bond issues slated for competitive sale today.
--South Suburb Park and Recreation, Colo., $4.7 million of general obligation refunding bonds.
--Bonneville, Idaho, $7.4 million of GO jail bonds.
--Washington, Ind., $5.3 million of water revenue bonds.
--Greene CSD, N.Y., $5.4 million of school district bonds.
--Nassau County, N.Y., $4.4 million and $89 million of improvement bonds.
--Rush-Henrietta CSD, N.Y., $3.7 million of school district bonds.
--Springfield Township SD, Pa., $9.9 million GO bonds.
--Pickens County, SD, S.C., $3.2 million, $3 million, $12 million and $7 million of GO bonds.
--Collierville, Tenn., $12 million water and sewer bonds.
